about_the_game:
The Art of Dark Envoy

Journey into the heart of Dark Envoy's visual development with this exclusive digital artbook. Spanning 35 pages, it unveils a trove of never-before-seen artwork, from initial sketches and concept art to the refined 3D models that brought the game to life.

Witness the evolution of stylized characters, diverse races, and intricate technology, all interwoven with a distinct aesthetic.

The Artbook is a must-have for fans seeking a deeper appreciation of Dark Envoy's visual artistry. Delve into the creative process and uncover the secrets behind this mesmerizing universe that blends elements of fantasy with a steampunk aesthetic, described as "Guns n' Sorcery".

[Important note: After downloading, head over to the game's main catalogue on your hard-drive, where you will find a "Dark Envoy Artbook.pdf" file to enjoy it offline]

The Artbook is a must-have for fans seeking a deeper appreciation of Dark Envoy's visual artistry. Delve into the creative process and uncover the secrets behind this mesmerizing universe that blends elements of fantasy with a steampunk aesthetic, described as "Guns n' Sorcery".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Dark Envoy Artbook offers a fascinating glimpse into the creation of the game's rich and evocative world. Filled with concept art and sketches, it showcases the intricate details of all that brings Jaan to life, capturing the unique blend of technology and magic that defines games's aesthetic.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
